item.title: WATCH: Man in patriotic bathing suit chases runaway beach umbrella

item.title: WATCH: Amazon truck loses control and veers off road
item.description: Dramatic video shows the moment an Amazon truck driver in Iowa lost control and swerved off the road into some trees. While there was some property da...

item.title: Texas flooding updates: Death toll rises to 24 in 'extraordinary catastrophe'
item.description: At least 24 people have died after heavy rain pounded Kerr County, Texas, early Friday, leading to "catastrophic" flooding, the sheriff said.

item.title: Trump signs divisive spending bill during White House military picnic
item.description: President Donald Trump celebrated the Fourth of July by signing his massive spending bill that narrowly passed in Congress this week.
